SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PHQ-9 - How Difficult have Problems Made it for You to Work, Take Care of Things, or Get Along with Other People

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down.
Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PHQ-9 - Feeling Down, Depressed, or Hopeless

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Feeling tired or having little energy.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PHQ-9 - Feeling Tired or Having Little Energy

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Little interest or pleasure in doing things.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PHQ-9 - Little Interest or Pleasure in Doing Things

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PHQ-9 - Moving or Speaking Slowly or the Opposite being Fidgety or Restless

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Poor appetite or overeating.

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: PHQ01-Thoughts You Be Better Off Dead
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: PHQ01-Thoughts You Be Better Off Dead
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PHQ-9 - Thoughts That You Would be Better Off Dead

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television.
Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PHQ-9 - Trouble Falling or Staying Asleep, or Sleeping Too Much
